name: Aunt Sarah's 588 Cafe
text:
House Made Nachos
For 2-3 people: $18

For 3-5 people: $25 Includes side salsa and sour cream

Wings
Price: $18 One pound served with ranch dressing

Sauces available: Honey Garlic, Sweet Chili Thai, Frank's Hot Sauce, Buffalo Sauce, BBQ, BBQ with Heartbeat Hot Sauce, Salt N Pepper, Lemon Pepper

Pizza
Price: $23 Includes side of sauce

Panzo
Price: $18 Includes side of sauce

Pizza/Panzo toppings: Pepperoni, Bacon, Ham, Italian Sausage, Ground Beef, Green or Red Peppers, Red or White Onions, Black or Green Olives, Mushrooms, Banana Peppers, Jalapenos

Pizza Combo
Price: $40 Includes:

14" Pizza

1 pound wings

2 cans pop

With large salad add $8

Panzo Combo
Price: $35 Includes:

1 Panzo

1 pound wings

2 cans pop

With large salad add $8

Platters
Served with coleslaw and choice of mashed, fries, soup, or garden salad

Poutine add $4

Onion rings add $2

Hot Hamburger Sandwich/Nip: $18

6 oz ground beef patty with mustard & onions on a brioche bun or choice of bread topped with gravy

Hot Beef or Turkey Sandwich: $20

Roasted beef or turkey on white bread topped with gravy

Chicken Fingers with Dipping Sauce: $20

4 pieces of crispy fried chicken breast strips served with plum sauce for dipping

Roast Beef or Frisco Melt: $20

Grilled sandwich filled with sauteed onions, mixed cheese, garlic aioli and either tender sliced roast beef or 6 oz ground beef patty

2 Slice Clubhouse Sandwich: $20

Clubhouse has tomatoes, lettuce, loads of bacon, in house roasted turkey, cheddar and mayo on choice of 2 slices of toast (will do 3 slices on request, same price)

Sides
Fries: Large $10, Regular $6.50

Poutine: $13/$9.50

Soup of the Day: Large $8, Side $6.50, Small $4.40

Onion Rings: $8

Garden Salad: Large $12, Regular $8

Coleslaw: Large $6, Regular $4, Side $1.50

Mashed Potatoes: $6.50

Gravy: Large $6, Regular $4, Side $1.50

Watch for specials posted on Facebook & in cafe daily.

All soups are homemade. Gravy made from bone broth. All menu items made with love.

Dine in or take out. Call ahead orders appreciated.

Prices include HST, subject to change without notice.

All Day Breakfast
Denver Sandwich with Panfries: $18

2 Egg omelet with Mixed Cheese, Green Onions, Red Peppers, Ham and Bacon on choice of toast.

Egg Sammy: $9

Fried Egg sandwich on an English Muffin topped with cheese and bacon. (ham or sausage may be substituted for bacon)

588 Breakfast Platters:

2 Eggs, 2 Sausages, 2 Bacon, Panfries and choice of toast: $14

3 Eggs, 3 Sausages, 3 Bacon, Panfries and choice of toast: $19

Granny's Chili
Chili & Toast: $10

12 oz bowl of Chili served with choice of toast.

Chili Hot Dog: $8

This hot dog is topped with Chili, onions and Cheese on a bun served with an 8oz soup, garden salad or fries.

Chili Cheese Fries: $13/$9.50

Hand cut fries topped with Chili and Cheese.

Chili Burger: $9

4 oz Ground beef patty topped with Chili, onion and Cheese on a Brioche Bun served with an 8oz soup, garden salad or fries.

Wraps & Sandwiches
Veggies n Cheeses: $11

Cream Cheese, Parmesan & Mixed Cheese plus Cucumbers, Tomatoes, Sweet Peppers, Red Onions, Lettuce and a drizzle of Ranch Dressing.

Crisp Chicken & Bacon Wrap: $14

Crispy Chicken lightly dusted in our own blend of spices wrapped with mixed cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, bacon and ranch dressing.

Cheeseburger Wrap: $12

6 oz burger patty, lettuce, tomato, mixed cheese, red onion, garlic aioli.

Scrambler Wrap: $12

2 Eggs, Red Peppers, Green Onions, Ham, Bacon and Mixed Cheese plus drizzle of Hollandaise sauce.

B.L.T.: $9

Egg or Tuna Salad: $7

Grilled Cheese with Ham: $8

Ham & Cheese with Lettuce: $8

Super Burgers
SUPER 588 BURGER: $14

Aunty’s Burger Sauce, Red Onion.

SUPER CUBAN BEEF BURGER: $19

Lean Ham, Swiss Cheese, Honey Mustard, Garlic Aioli and Crisp Onions.

SUPER BACON & CHEESE BURGER: $18

Bacon, Cheddar & Monterey Jack, Garlic Aioli, Crisp Onions.

SUPER SIZZLIN JALAPENO BURGER: $19

Jalapenos, Monterey & Cheddar Cheese, Bacon, Garlic Aioli, Crisp Onions.

SUPER BRUNCH BURGER: $23

Bacon, Cheddar & Monterey Jack, Lean Ham, Sunny Side Up Egg, Garlic Aioli, Crisp Onions.

SPICY COWBOY CHICKEN & SWISS: $20

Lightly dusted 5 oz Chicken Breast topped with Swiss cheese, Bacon, Cowboy Candy (spicy) Mayo & crisp onion.

CHICKEN CORDON BLEU BURGER: $20

Ham, Swiss Cheese & Crisp onions top this 5 oz Lightly Dusted then Fried Chicken Breast.

CHICKEN CLUB BURGER: $20

5 oz Grilled or Lightly Dusted then Fried Chicken Breast, Bacon Slices, Cheddar & Monterey Jack Cheese, Lettuce, Tomatoes and Mayo.

Add Ons
Add Cheese: $1.75

Add Egg: $3.50

Add Bacon: $3

Add Extra Beef Patty: $8
